messages.title: ON JOBS WILL KILL THE RECOVERY
messages.content: The re-election of Gordon Brown's government - more debt, more waste and taxes - will bring us a new recession.
With Jim Paice and farmers at Hallworthy. Farming is vitally important in North Cornwall.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Criticizing the then-government for increasing debt and taxes, mentioning a specific figure about Labour politicians admitting waste. Proposes reducing national insurance tax to stimulate job creation.

issues.economy: Criticizing the then-government for increasing debt and taxes, mentioning a specific figure about Labour politicians admitting waste.

images.caption: Sian Flynn working with David Cameron
With Jim Paice and farmers at Hallworthy. Farming is vitally important in North Cornwall. Sian's regularly met farmers at Hallworthy Market to hear their concerns.
